definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: The thief withered under the stare of the policeman.
sentences.chinese: 小偷在警察的逼視下顯得惶恐不安。

sentences.english: He knew the end was coming, and he was unsure.
sentences.chinese: 他知道自己時日不多了，而感到惶恐不安。

sentences.english: The church women outnumbering men in a small dilemma has kept and sisters live in fear of marriage.
sentences.chinese: 而教會女多男少的窘境，更讓姐妹對婚姻惶恐不安。

sentences.english: Fear is a poor guide to the future.
sentences.chinese: 惶恐不安是通向未來的一個無用嚮導。

sentences.english: The thief withered under the stare of the policeman .
sentences.chinese: 小偷在警察的逼視下顯得惶恐不安。

definition: to be on tenterhooks (idiom)/to be anxious and frightened
trembling with fear/with fear and trepidation
anxious and perplexed/uneasy and confused/suspicious and fearful
lit. heart alarmed, trembling in fear (idiom); prostrate with fear/scared witless
to lose one's head out of fear (idiom)
see 驚慌失措|惊慌失措[jing1 huang1 shi1 cuo4]
